name: Don't Get Lost in Thoughts
description:
This is a very short horror visual novel. You play as a child who stays home alone for the first time.

This is literally the first game I make, and it is remotely inspired by events I remember experiencing as a child. I hope in the future to be able to create better works, and I would very much appreciate a feedback on this little project of mine. I'm thinking about adding more alternative endings. I am still struggling with Ren'py but when I will be able I'll try to make the game more animated.
